name: Packs of Fold out Christmas Cards - Various Designs
description:
Now you've seen our beautiful hand made Kirigami 3D Pop-up Christmas cards. You might be thinking about getting the cards for the masses. 

These fold out glittery Christmas cards are perfect to give to your work mates and neighbours. There are 20 different designs in total, and no matter what pack size you buy, each card will be hand picked to make sure you get a good variation of different designs.

Each card is folded in 5 places to make the card look like it has three tiers. 

We are currently offering packs of 5, 10, 15 and 20. The more you buy the cheaper they are.

Each card comes with an envelope and a plastic wallet.

All cards will be shipped by 2nd class signed for delivery.

name: Christmas Fireplace - Hand Made 3D Kirigami popup Christmas Card
description:
Why not buy your loved ones an extra special card this Christmas.

This stunning 3D pop-up Christmas Card showcases a Christmas scene of comforting Christmas fireplace with stockings hanging, a big Christmas Tree and lit candles with the message "Merry Christmas" over the mantel, the perfect Christmas setting. The front of the card has a cut out picture of some decorative bells and the words "Merry Christmas".

Delicately hand made with the ancient techniques of Origami and Kirigami, this beautiful card is sure to impress the lucky recipient.

All cards come with an envelope and are in a sealed plastic wallet.

Postage of this item within the UK is included in the cost of the card. Individual cards will be sent via standard 2nd class. If three or more are purchased at the same time, they will be posted via 2nd Class signed for delivery.

Any item sent overseas will be sent via Royal Air Mail at a flat rate of £3.50

You can also buy packs of 5 cards at a reduced rate of £3 each. 

We only have a limited number of these cards in stock due to the amount of time it takes to make them individually. Get 'em while they're HOT!

name: Bells of Holly - Hand Made 3D Kirigami popup Christmas Card
description:
Why not buy your loved ones an extra special card this Christmas.

This stunning 3D pop-up Christmas Card showcases a beautiful Christmas image of bells & Holly with the word "Noel" underneath. There is a cut out message inside the card reading "Merry Christmas" in fancy writing. The front of the card has a cut out picture of a scroll with two bells and the words "Merry Christmas".

Delicately hand made with the ancient techniques of Origami and Kirigami, this beautiful card is sure to impress the lucky recipient.

All cards come with an envelope and are in a sealed plastic wallet.

Postage of this item within the UK is included in the cost of the card. Individual cards will be sent via standard 2nd class. If three or more are purchased at the same time, they will be posted via 2nd Class signed for delivery.

name: Santa's Sleigh - Hand Made 3D Kirigami popup Christmas Card
description:
Why not buy your loved ones an extra special card this Christmas.

This stunning 3D pop-up Christmas Card showcases a Christmas scene of Santa Clause in his sleigh delivering presents. The card has cut out lettering inside with the message "Merry Christmas & Happy New Year". The Front of the card has a cut out of Santa Clause with the words "Merry Christmas".

Delicately hand made with the ancient techniques of Origami and Kirigami, this beautiful card is sure to impress the lucky recipient.

All cards come with an envelope and are in a sealed plastic wallet.
